question:
[Gerald] and his brother [Lawrence] went to a basketball game. [Lawrence]'s sister [Alice] decided to tag along with them. [Freddie]'s brother, [Gerald], recently made it into town. [Alice] and her brother [Lawrence] went to see a movie. [Joseph] and [Janice] asked their mother, if they could go play in the pool. [Ethel] and her son, [Henry], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [Kenneth]'s nephew [Henry] was happy to hear that he will be arriving at the airport later tonight. [Joseph] took his son [Lawrence] out for ice cream. [Ethel], who is the sister of [Janice], is a lovely girl.
Question: How is [Kenneth] related to [Freddie]?
